Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/7/1987 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/3/1989, off Randy Johnson (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1989, off Allan Anderson (CIN)...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (M) on 8/2/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 8/4/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 6/7/1991...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/18/1992 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
